shootergame.interactor

Class Spike

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.StaticBody
        • shootergame.interactor.Spike
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    city.cs.engine.SensorListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Spike
extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
implements city.cs.engine.SensorListener
    Procedurally reduces the health of the player depending how long the player object stands on the spike.
